bibl.title: More from the Dossier of Count John, Son of Timagenes (P. Ups. inv. 37).
bibl.note: Oxyrhynchites, 12.11.484p. The text is addressed to the Count John of P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4696.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Ups. Inv. 37 145.4 P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4696
Todd M. Hickey, More from the Dossier of Count John, Son of Timagenes (P. Ups. inv. 37).
Guido Bastianini & Simona Russo (edd.), Comunicazioni. Istituto Papirologico ""G. Vitelli"". 11 (Firenze, 2013) pp. 87-89 et pl. XVI.
Oxyrhynchites, 12.11.484p. The text is addressed to the Count John of P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4696.
